/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or require counting of objects. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-organized and orderly cityscape. The image does not contain any imaginary content; everything described can be confidently determined from the image itself.
